property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) ■ When you put this creature, look at the top 5 cards of your deck. Put one of them into your hand, and put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order. Then you may cast a spell that costs 3 or less from your hand for no cost.

card.name: ACE-Yamata, Eight-headed Dragon / Mystic Treasure Sword

property.name: Name1
property.value: ACE-Yamata, Eight-headed Dragon

property.name: Name2
property.value: Mystic Treasure Sword

property.name: Race
property.value: Earth Dragon/Origin

property.name: Race1
property.value: Earth Dragon/Origin

property.name: Rules
property.value: {MACH FIGHTER} (This creature can attack tapped or untapped creatures on the turn you put it.) {TRIPLE BREAKER} ■ Whenever one of your creatures would leave, you may put them into your mana zone instead. ■ Whenever this creature wins a battle, you may put a creature that costs the same as or less than the number of cards in your mana zone from your mana zone. TWINPACT ■ Search your deck. You may take a non-nature card from your deck and put it into your mana zone tapped. Then shuffle your deck.

property.name: Rules1
Rules2
property.value: ■ Search your deck. You may take a non-nature card from your deck and put it into your mana zone tapped. Then shuffle your deck.

property.name: Rarity
property.value: No Rarity

property.name: Set
property.value: DMBD-18 Legend Super Deck: The Storm of Divine Songs

property.name: Race
property.value: Samurai/Origin/Poseidia Dragon

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature, choose one of the following: ► Put all your opponent's creatures that have power 3000 or less into their owner's mana zone. ► Look at the top card of your deck and add it to your hand or put it into mana zone. Then choose a creature from your hand or mana zone that costs the same as or less the number of cards in your mana zone that can evolve from this creature and put it on this creature.

property.name: Rarity
property.value: No Rarity

property.name: Set
property.value: DMBD-18 Legend Super Deck: The Storm of Divine Songs

card.name: The Door of God Song and Ryostorm

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this card is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast/summon it immediately for no cost.) ■ Reveal the top 4 cards of your deck and your opponent chooses a creature from among them. Put that creature and put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order. At the end of the turn, put that creature on the bottom of your deck. ■ You may choose one of your creatures and one of your opponent's creatures. Those 2 creatures battle.

property.name: Rarity
property.value: No Rarity

property.value: King Command Dragon/Origin

property.name: Rules
property.value: {QUATTRO BREAKER} ■ Each of your creatures gets "speed attacker". ■ Whenever an opponent's creature attacks, they must attack creatures if able. ■ Your opponent can't choose this creature with spells.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SPEED ATTACKER} (This creature doesn't get summoning sickness.) {POWER ATTACKER} +5000 (While attacking, this creature gets +2000 power.) {TRIPLE BREAKER} ■ Whenever this creature attacks, you and your opponent play {GACHINKO JUDGE}. If you win,take an extra turn after this one ({GACHINKO JUDGE}: Each player reveals the top card of their deck, then puts it on the bottom. You win if your card costs the same as or more than your opponent.)

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Victory Rare

property.name: Set
property.value: DMBD-18 Legend Super Deck: The Storm of Divine Songs

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this card is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast/summon it immediately for no cost.) ■ Put the top 2 cards of your deck into your mana zone tapped. ■ Return a creature from your mana zone to your hand. Then you may choose one of your opponent's creatures that costs the same as or less than that creature and return it to its owner's hand.

property.name: Set

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.) ■ Shuffle your deck, then reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is a creature, you may put it into the battle zone. If that card is a spell, you may cast it for no cost.

property.name: Rules

property.name: Rules
property.value: {GUARD STRIKE} (When you add this spell from your shield zone to your hand, you may reveal it to your opponent and choose one of your opponent's creatures. That creature can't attack this turn.) ■ Put the top card of your deck into your mana zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {DOUBLE BREAKER} {SHIELD FORCE} (As you put this creature, you may choose one of your shields. While that shield is in your shield zone, this creature gets the following Shield Force abilities.) This creature gets "blocker". When this creature would leave, it stays instead.

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Very Rare

property.name: Set
property.value: DMBD-18 Legend Super Deck: The Storm of Divine Songs

property.name: Race
property.value: Cyber Lord/Shinobi

property.name: Rules
property.value: {NINJA STRIKE} 7 (Whenever one of your opponent's creatures attacks or blocks, if you have 7 or more cards in your mana zone and if during that attack you didn't use a "Ninja Strike" ability, you may summon this Shinobi for no cost. At the end of that turn, put this Shinobi on the bottom of your deck.) ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, choose another creature in the battle zone and put it on the bottom of its owner's deck. That creature's owner reveals cards from the top of their deck until he reveals a non-evolution creature, puts that creature into the battle zone, and then puts the rest of the revealed cards on the bottom of their deck in any order.

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Very Rare

property.name: Set
property.value: DMBD-18 Legend Super Deck: The Storm of Divine Songs

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.) ■ Look at the top 4 cards of your deck. You may choose a spell that has "shield trigger" from among them. Put the rest of the cards on the bottom of your deck in any order. Then cast the chosen spell for no cost.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMBD-18 Legend Super Deck: The Storm of Divine Songs

property.name: Rules
property.value:
{SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.)
■ Creatures can't attack this turn. ■ Shieldify this spell. Then put one of your shields into your graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ This turn, the next creature you summon costs 3 less to summon. It can't cost less than 1.
